title: Riot please dont nerf Black Cleaver
body:
please dont nerf BC because of Lucian.

Lucian is the problem NOT Black Cleaver. Dont nerf 16 fighters/juggernauts because ONE ADC is abusing it
lucian is the reason why 40% of marksman pool are unviable because how unbalanced he is. im not asking to gut lucian im asking to nerf him fairly since he is still a fun champion to play.

so riot please dont nerf Fighters/Juggernauts because of Lucian

replies.body: TBH Lucian only became a problem when Riot decided that CDR should be very accessible to ADC's
That has nothing to do with Cleaver, though. That's an Essence Reaver problem, and ER Lucian doesn't build Cleaver
I agree
Champs should be balanced around their best case. If he was out of line then all they need to do is balance accordingly. He could achieve 40% CDR beforehand anyway

> [{quoted}](name=bloodmoth,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JpvgUthi,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-05-15T00:51:25.195+0000)

See but before a 40% CDR build would have been pretty bad on him. Its Essence Reaver rework that makes it good because it made him going Essence Reaver and zeal item that isn't triforce hit 30% CDR which wasn't how he worked before.

Towards the end of last season he was seen as kind of whatever. Its the adc rework giving him RFC and Essence reaver in particular come to mind as buffing him.

Youre only half right. 

The ER rework made people realize how strong a 40% CDR build was. 

Now people are going the Ghostblade/Black Cleaver to reach the 40% CDR build with the earlier spike in damage without needing to build all those expensive crit items. The RFC and ER buffed him, sure, but thats not his "problematic" build at the moment.

Before the rework, 40% cdr meant you weren't building damage optimal items.
Now you still get a BF item in Reaver, then you have whichever the best Zeal item is (instead of choice between Shiv and Triforce), and then one other item or cdr boots.
They used to have to trade combat stats for that cdr, but they no longer need to. Essence Reaver completely removed that trade-off.

We'll be nerfing Lucian because of Lucian. Ranges most likely (possible options at present look like Q passthrough range and W range), with the goal of keeping his in fight power/mobility but making him pay a bit more price for it.

How about nerfing his Q so that it doesn't cast if he gets stunned or silenced? I've seen it happen to many time where a Twisted Fate could ''interrupt'' Lucian while he's charging up, but the animation would still finish in spite of Lucian being stunned, allowing him to burst the enemy regardless.
its not a channel, it have a cast animation, but no cast time.
Think Ez E and Blitz Q

wait, why are you nerfing Lucian? He isn't even that strong. He's played in ranked mostly because he is fun and in competative because of his mobility. His winrate is literally 50% yet he's up for a nerf? Meanwhile Twitch gets to stay at 55% assassinating squishes and melting tanks whenever he decides to ult. 

Lucian is seeing so much play because the meta favors adcs who can live long enough to do damage, blame the environment, not the champ.
Lucian also has a 40% playrate, meaning he's crowding out other ADCs.
Good, make other adcs playable then instead of making one that is actually functional, worse.

other adc's are playable, lucian just outdamages them during laning phase, midgame, and lategame. he has a super high playrate because he is overpowered, not because he is "fun" otherwise people would've been playing him before the adc update, but they didnt.

The problem with Lucian is simple: His strength comes from his passive, right? Well, his Piercing Light and Culling just shouldn't hurt that much, because then you have a champion with a super strong passive to trade and on top of his passive, can just throw really powerful cheap skills on a low CD to make his burst even harder at very low risk or cost.
There's **NEVER** a situation where you think "I should keep my Q" because the cool down is low, the cost is low, and the damage is high, where other ADCs reliant on skills are playing sometimes with CDs of 15 - 20 seconds cofcoftristcof.
Lucian right now is strong early, mid and late game. Many casters have pointed out that the reason why he's played so much is because his power spike is too smooth, very efficient and he never has a "weak moment" in the game. He's always strong, and it's because he has spamable skills that pile on top of a very strong passive.

One could make a case about _"How OP Vayne is late game"_ or _"How oppressive Cait is in lane"_ but Vayne has an atrocious abusable early game, and Cait has some trouble between minute 10 to around minute 25 or 30.

Lucian is always strong.

By all means, throw a slight nerf on his passthrough. But I don't think you're considering the fact that you've already nerfed his ult range and he has a 500 attack range. And in this meta of massive tanks and bursty (and even tankier) mages, how's he gonna fare? It's no wonder he gets picked more because aside from having a strong early game (which honestly I don't find is That impressive, coming from low plat) he's also a safe pick. Caster ADC's are generally irrelevant after 25 minutes or so when tanks get too beefy to burst (your LW items still suck, because it's not Bonus armor that's the problem, it's the massive fucktons of hp and cc to account for in taking down a tank.) Consider this: Maokai is slowly getting out of hand because he can 1v1 a carry late in the game with a visage, thornmail, and rooting every 4 seconds. It already takes 2-3 players to keep that one tank/juggernaut from murdering your carry.

Anywho, no, I don't think the answer is nerfing Lucian, but rather buffing the other carries. It's always "nerf it" with you guys except when it came to juggernauts lately, for the most part. Black cleaver became a decent powerspike item that works for a lot of other ADC's besides just Lucian. Just because it's part of a popular Korean build doesn't mean it's suddenly a huge problem. Lucian just works well with it because he can proc its stacks to 30% penetration rather quickly. But again, it's a healthy item for many ADC's in the meta right now, and isn't diversity part of your imaginary slogan? All you're doing is helping force this cookie-cutter Essence reaver garbage build onto him. Cooldown's great, but he can also get that cooldown and more attack damage for cheaper. I'd say give it more time before the nerf.

Off-topic: now about your "high risk high reward" philosophy {{champion:7}} {{champion:105}} :^)

Well it's a little bit of both being a problem. Mostly Lucian though yeah.

BC on ADC was super niche last season when we still had old LW. And all the while it costed 3500g; way more than armor powerspikes. I'm guessing BC was supposed to cost that much maybe because it was meant to be a later game item for fighters. The problem with BC strong as a first item is it counters armor and continues to scale itself up with your damage and your opponent's defenses and almost makes the user target agnostic.

Full tanks have been overbearing all season before we decided to bring back BC as relief. But it still has its old problems.

This season though ADCs had to have used {{item:3036}} . Buying this item while often necessary is a sour pill to swallow as it's limited effectiveness attacking carries. Comparitively BC becomes much more attractive to ADCs now that the old generally broken LW is gone. Especially on Lucian who abuses BC unfairly well with his ult, passive and CDR wants.

A possible solution is to put more crit interaction into Lucian's kit but nerf the base effectiveness. Make Lucian's ult crit like MF's? Not sure if it truly solves the problem but for the most part I'm only annoyed with both Lucian with BC. I'm fine with melee characters & Gnar building BC.
